actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide additional benefits to veterans injured while in treatment at a Veterans' Administration health care facility or in a program of vocational rehabilitation.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to award other service-connected injury benefits, in addition to currently available compensation, to veterans injured while in treatment at a Veterans' Administration health care facility or in a program of vocational rehabilitation.

titles.title: A bill to provide additional benefits to veterans injured while in treatment at a Veterans' Administration health care facility or in a program of vocational rehabilitation.
